English version:  we rent our newly refurbished and refurnished flat located in Paris.The flat is ideally located in the 14th district of Paris, nearby the Place d'Alesia.
Our flat comprises 2 bedrooms with beds for four people in total, 1 bathroom (with a bath), 1 toilets, 1 fully equipped kitchen, 1 living room and 1 dining room.
The flat is 76 squared meters (c. 818 squared feet).

The flat is at the third floor (no lift for the moment, only stairs) of a building of Paris from the late 19th / early 20th century. The flat is oriented to the South which brings a lot of light all over the day (and a nice sunset view from the living room).
The flat has just been fully restored and refurnished (end of July 2019)!
The flat has been mainly refurnished with design pieces of furniture.

All the windows in the flat are double glazed. The kitchen and bathroom are fully equipped with : a fridge, oven, microwave, dish machine and washing machine.
